Cost-Effective Enterprise Video Management

Case Study: How Beeready.io Used api.video to Create an Interview Training Platform

The Problem

Non-technical founders needed a cost-effective way to implement enterprise video management (upload, hosting, and delivery) while ensuring interview recordings remained private between coaches and candidates.

The Solution

By leveraging api.video's infrastructure, the team abstracted the complexity of transcoding and hosting, allowing them to deploy a secure, asynchronous video communication platform without a background in web development.

Impact: Successfully launched a scalable MVP with a customizable player and private video delivery, supported by a "low-code" implementation strategy. Read Full Technical Analysis →
No-Code Video Solutions

Case Study: How api.video Helped a Couple Build a Digital Dance Academy Without Coding

The Problem

The founders of Neva Ballet needed to transition a traditional dance academy into a global digital platform. Without a technical background or engineering team, they struggled to provide high-quality lesson replays that matched the professional standards of classical ballet while keeping operational costs low. While Wix and Zoom were great for building an ecommerce site with live streams, they did not have a good way to offer customers high quality playbacks of classes.

The Solution

api.video solved their problems by providing high quality HLS live streams that looked great in playback, customizable players, easy implementation and reasonable prices.

Impact: Scaled to 9 disciplines and a global subscription model within one year. The architecture reduced costs enough to offer subscriptions at 50% of the market rate while maintaining superior video quality. Read Full Technical Analysis →
Live Streaming & Hybrid Events

Case Study: How InEvent used api.video to Produce Virtual and Hybrid Events

The Problem

As in-person events halted, InEvent needed to pivot to a virtual model. They required a way to broadcast multi-person WebRTC sessions to thousands of global viewers simultaneously while ensuring high-quality recordings were available immediately for on-demand replay.

The Solution

InEvent used api.video to transcode RTMP streams into HLS for massive distribution. Leveraging unique simultaneous MP4/HLS recording features, they bypassed traditional processing delays to provide instant downloads for event organizers.

Impact: Successfully expanded into the US and European markets with a robust hybrid offering that supports real-time interaction and immediate post-event content delivery at scale. Read Full Technical Analysis →
